devdoc.details: Manages farmings and performs entry, exit and other actions.

params.tokenId: The ID of the token for which liquidity is being added
The ID of the token which is being burned

claimReward(address,address,uint256).details: can be used via static call to get current rewards for user

params.amountRequested: Amount to claim in eternal farming
params.rewardToken: The token that is a reward

returns.reward: The summary amount of claimed rewards

returns.bonusReward: The amount of collected  bonus reward

params.pool: The AlgebraPool for which farming was created
params.virtualPool: The virtual pool to be connected

enterFarming((address,address,address,ui.details: token must be deposited in FarmingCenter

multicall(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from multicall.

params.data: The encoded function data for each of the calls to make to this contract

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via data

virtualPoolAddresses.details: saves addresses of virtual pools for pool

devdoc.title: Algebra main farming contract

applyLiquidityDelta(uint256,int256).notice: Report a change of liquidity in position

burnPosition(uint256).notice: Report a burn of position token

claimReward(address,address,uint256).notice: Used to claim and send rewards from farming(s)

collectRewards((address,address,address,.notice: Used to collect reward from eternal farming. Then reward can be claimed.

enterFarming((address,address,address,ui.notice: Enters in incentive (time-limited or eternal farming) with NFT-position token

exitFarming((address,address,address,uin.notice: Exits from incentive (time-limited or eternal farming) with NFT-position token

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Call multiple functions in the current contract and return the data from all of them if they all succeed

nonfungiblePositionManager().notice: The nonfungible position manager with which this farming contract is compatible
